moves.name: Confusion
moves.description: The target is hit by a weak telekinetic force. It may also leave the target confused.

moves.name: Disable
moves.description: For four turns, this move prevents the target from using the move it last used.

moves.name: Safeguard
moves.description: The user creates a protective field that prevents status problems for five turns.

moves.name: Swift
moves.description: Star-shaped rays are shot at the opposing team. This attack never misses.

moves.name: Future Sight
moves.description: Two turns after this move is used, a hunk of psychic energy attacks the target.

moves.name: Psych Up
moves.description: The user hypnotizes itself into copying any stat change made by the target.

moves.name: Miracle Eye
moves.description: Enables a Dark-type target to be hit by Psychic-type attacks. It also enables an evasive target to be hit.

moves.name: Psycho Cut
moves.description: The user tears at the target with blades formed by psychic power. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Power Swap
moves.description: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Attack and Sp. Atk with the target.

moves.name: Guard Swap
moves.description: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Defense and Sp. Def with the target.

moves.name: Recover
moves.description: Restoring its own cells, the user restores its own HP by half of its max HP.

moves.name: Psychic
moves.description: The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force. It may also reduce the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Barrier
moves.description: The user throws up a sturdy wall that sharply raises its Defense stat.

moves.name: Aura Sphere
moves.description: The user looses a blast of aura power from deep within its body at the target. This move is certain to hit.

moves.name: Amnesia
moves.description: The user temporarily empties its mind to forget its concerns. It sharply raises the user's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Mist
moves.description: The user cloaks its body with a white mist that prevents any of its stats from being cut for five turns.

moves.name: Me First
moves.description: The user tries to cut ahead of the target to steal and use the target's intended move with greater power.

moves.name: Psystrike
moves.description: The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This attack does physical damage.
